FuncDef:
The qppb qos-local-id command enables QPPB globally.
The undo qppb qos-local-id command disables QPPB globally.
By default, QPPB is disabled globally.
CLIs: qppb qos-local-id { source | destination | both inbound }
undo qppb qos-local-id { source | destination | both inbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates source address- and destination address-based QPPB.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To implement QoS scheduling for packets received on multiple interfaces based on BGP route attributes, run the qppb qos-local-id command to enable QPPB globally.
Prerequisites
A traffic policy has been globally applied and allows unified QoS scheduling for packets that have the same attributes and are sent from different interfaces.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
